ch.aplu.robotsim

Class NxtSoundSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actor
      • ch.aplu.robotsim.Part
        • ch.aplu.robotsim.NxtSoundSensor

  • public class NxtSoundSensor
extends Part
    Class that represents a NXT sound sensor. The sound is taken from the standard audio device. A microphone must be available.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NxtSoundSensor(SensorPort port)
      Creates a sensor instance connected to the given port.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSoundListener(SoundListener listener)
      Registers the given sound listener with default trigger level 50.

      Registers the given sound listener for the given trigger level.
      int getValue()
      Polls the sensor.
      void sampleReceived(int count) 
      int setTriggerLevel(int triggerLevel)
      Sets a new trigger level and returns the previous one.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NxtSoundSensor

        public NxtSoundSensor(SensorPort port)
        Creates a sensor instance connected to the given port. Only one sensor instance is allowed.
        Parameters:
        port - the port where the sensor is plugged-in

    • Method Detail

      • addSoundListener

        public void addSoundListener(SoundListener listener,
                    int triggerLevel)
        Registers the given sound listener for the given trigger level.
        Parameters:
        listener - the SoundListener to register
        triggerLevel - the trigger level where the callback is triggered

      • addSoundListener

        public void addSoundListener(SoundListener listener)
        Registers the given sound listener with default trigger level 50.
        Parameters:
        listener - the SoundListener to register

      • setTriggerLevel

        public int setTriggerLevel(int triggerLevel)
        Sets a new trigger level and returns the previous one.
        Parameters:
        triggerLevel - the new trigger level
        Returns:
        the previous trigger level

      • sampleReceived

        public void sampleReceived(int count)

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Polls the sensor. Calls Thread.sleep(1) to prevent CPU overload in close polling loops.
        Returns:
        the current value the sensor reported: 0 (quiet) .. 150 (loud)
